name: height
description: Height of the SVG (number interpreted as px).

name: width
description: Width of the SVG (number interpreted as px).

name: color
description: Primary color applied to the loader. Defaults to DEFAULT_COLOR.

name: ariaLabel
description: Accessible label announced to screen readers.

name: wrapperStyle
description: Inline style object applied to the wrapper element.

name: wrapperClass
description: CSS class applied to the wrapper for custom styling.

name: visible
description: When false, the loader is not rendered. Defaults to true.

name: strokeWidth
description: Stroke width of the rotating lines.

name: animationDuration
description: Duration of the rotation animation in seconds.

name: strokeColor
description: Color of the stroke for the lines.
